channel.title: Town Of Salem Turbo (canned due to low numbers)
channel.description:
## Welcome
### Rules
### Gameplay Cycles are 5 minutes during the day, or shorter if somebody dies. 2 minutes during the night Actions are done by messaging me Mafia/Coven/Vampires/Lovers will talk through a special server Medium will speak with the dead through a separate server When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it. To Whisper a player, type "**/whisper (player) [message]"**. no players will be alerted except the player you whispered. The player you whispered will know you whispered them
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" There are no trials, whoever has most votes at the end of the day will be executed. Executions end the Day Trials pause the counter
### After The Night You will be told what happened to you
### Wills Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed.
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist: I will be randomising it from either: Classic: Balanced roles, either Mafia or Coven. All Any: Any roles, balance is not guarenteed. Lovers: People will be paired as lovers, and a unique role list will be added.
Players: 1. GamerPoke- Alive 2. Sam17z - Alive 3. player3 - Alive 4. player4 - Alive 5. player5 - Alive 6. player6 - Alive 7. player7 - Alive 8. player8 - Alive 9. player9 - Alive 10. player10 - Alive 11. player11 - Alive 12. player12 - Alive 13. player13 - Alive 14. player14 - Alive 15. player15 - Alive # [color=Yellow] the game will begin on [date=2019-03-13 time=09:00:00 timezone="Australia/Sydney"] if there is a sufficient amount of people[/color]

item.title: Town Of Salem Turbo (canned due to low numbers)
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Simon:

his aggressive responses (in like the 1st half mainly) served to lengthen this out and make it harder for me to accurately answer to his points

If you feel like my responses are too aggressive, then you should just leave. I have told you this NUMEROUS times, yet you ignored me, so you cannot blame me when you instigated it and continued it, because it meant that you wanted it(stop blaming me for your life choices). Additionally, aggressive responses are in no way, shape, or form illogical or against whatever fucking rules. I also cannot see how my foul language makes it harder for you to answer points when I state them pretty clearly in my opinion, and also put them in bullet points for you to answer. If you refuse to answer them, then I have no clue what you are talking about or trying to argue about so that is not entirely my fault, so I ask you one last time, what the fuck do you want and what point are you trying to drive across.

Read full topic

item.title: Town Of Salem Turbo (canned due to low numbers)
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Simon:

he should have told me he felt disrespected eariler on

MaximusPrime:

i will literally join the tos discord to roast your fucking ass don’t even start

I have also told you many times to not continue yet you went ahead anyway, so it means that you wanted this, yeah?

MaximusPrime:

simon don’t fight a fight you’ve already lost

Additionally, if I feel offended, I am in NO OBLIGATION to tell you so. Normal people don’t tend to say they feel offended in casual situations(which it was until it was escalated). Putting your intentional bad attitude on me is the epitome of arrogance and I cannot see how it is my fault at all for your shitty behavior. Yes, I did insult you afterwards, but you also admitted that you were condescending so it was not undeserved, did nothing to try and fix it, continued to spam like you did nothing wrong, refused to answer logical and reasonable points, and tried to pin the blame on me.

Read full topic
item.source: Town Of Salem Turbo (canned due to low numbers)

item.title: Town Of Salem Turbo (canned due to low numbers)
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
i’ll argue your points one at a time then, so you can see my viewpoint

Simon:

i was not intentionally disrespectful in the beginning post. i was intending to provide what i thought was a helpful correction

BUT you were disrespectful in your following posts and did not bother to correct your behavior after you even admitted that your way of typing can be seen as rude/condescending which only leads me to believe that you are doing it on purpose. Perhaps you were not doing it intentionally at first, BUT your posts followed a similar trend which makes it seem like it was intentional.

Read full topic

item.title: Town Of Salem Turbo (canned due to low numbers)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
I am arguing that i had not intended to disrespect him in the beginning, such that if he had opened with his anger on specifically that (and not making me wait till like 2/3s of the way through to tell me what he was referring to) and that his response to this all has been aggressive to the point of making it harder for me to answer specifically and logically and dragging this out.
more succinctly:

  • i was not intentionally disrespectful in the beginning post. i was intending to provide what i thought was a helpful correction
  • he should have told me he felt disrespected eariler on
  • his aggressive responses (in like the 1st half mainly) served to lengthen this out and make it harder for me to accurately answer to his points

and more recently:
he acted like he had asked me these questions and i had been ignoring them, but he has yet to quote the original times he asked these questions. i believe he never asked them, merely pretended to, then put the blame on me

Read full topic
